statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

articles.headline: Indiana Pacers vs. Chicago Bulls: Game Highlights
articles.description: Indiana Pacers vs. Chicago Bulls: Game Highlights

images.name: Indiana Pacers vs. Chicago Bulls: Game Highlights
images.caption: Indiana Pacers vs. Chicago Bulls: Game Highlights

articles.headline: Siakam scores season-high 36 points as Pacers beat struggling Bulls 120-105
articles.description: — Pascal Siakam scored a season-high 36 points, Bennedict Mathurin added 28 and the Indiana Pacers beat the struggling Chicago Bulls 120-105 on Friday night.

images.name: Matas Buzelis rocks the rim with powerful slam
images.caption: Matas Buzelis rocks the rim with powerful slam

articles.headline: Durant reaches 31,000 career points as Rockets dominate Suns
articles.description: — Kevin Durant had 28 points to become the eighth player in NBA history to score 31,000 career points as the Houston Rockets rolled to a 117-98 win over the Phoenix Suns on Friday night.

images.name: Ryan Dunn throws down powerful flush vs. Houston Rockets
images.caption: Ryan Dunn throws down powerful flush vs. Houston Rockets

articles.headline: Philadelphia 76ers vs. Milwaukee Bucks: Game Highlights
articles.description: Philadelphia 76ers vs. Milwaukee Bucks: Game Highlights

images.name: Philadelphia 76ers vs. Milwaukee Bucks: Game Highlights
images.caption: Philadelphia 76ers vs. Milwaukee Bucks: Game Highlights

articles.headline: Cade Cunningham has 29 points and 9 assists in Pistons' 122-116 win over Trail Blazers
articles.description: — Cade Cunningham had 13 of his 29 points in the fourth quarter and the Detroit Pistons rallied to beat the Portland Trail Blazers 122-116 on Friday night.

images.name: Cade Cunningham slams it home with authority
images.caption: Cade Cunningham throws down the hammer

articles.headline: Dyson Daniels notches 15 points in loss against the Nuggets
articles.description: Dyson Daniels finished with 15 points, 3 rebounds, 8 assists, and 2 steals for the Atlanta Hawks in a nail-biting loss to the Denver Nuggets

images.name: Dyson Daniels notches 15 points in loss against the Nuggets
images.caption: Dyson Daniels finished with 15 points, 3 rebounds, 8 assists, and 2 steals for the Atlanta Hawks in a nail-biting loss to the Denver Nuggets
